subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Good Box...Bad Box
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I never paid much attention as to which boxes produced more negatives, but I 
used to get alot when I first started this stuff. I tend to ignore those, 
and sometimes if it's in a segment I copy to the computer I'll play it 
backward. Reversed, sometimes the evil voices are angelic.  That's curious 
about it shutting off aplliances, I thought those ran on internal batteries. 
Maybe you're getting a lesson in energies?

I did get a quake warning in last nights test, it said  China suffers a 
quake, followed by August 11. I usually don't get dates, or locations, so I 
guess wait any see, of maybe they can evacuate China? Often, when a quake is 
coming I get a wolf image, well there's a wolf face on the shower window, 
kind of a medium size wolf, so I think if there is a quake it won't be real 
severe, maybe like a 6 or 7. Wolves for quakes, cats for wind, and bears for 
tsunamis, which I didn't know ahead of time. For Katrina I had a cat(image) 
with huge round eyes.


Frank
>From: "Steve Hultay" <urkel23@...>
>Reply-To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [EVP-ITC] Good Box...Bad Box
>Date: Mon, 30 Jul 2007 00:42:01 -0000
>
>
>Does anybody think it's possible to get 2 extreme opposites in
>communication?  1 Box curses at me constantly and tells me to die and
>also talks about the end of the world and hell.  And the other one
>talks about how pretty it is there and i always get "Hi" and "I'm
>Here" as well as "Don't leave" when i'm signing off and an
>occasional "Goodbye".  Has anyone experienced anything like this
>before?  The 1 box even shuts off appliances in my house when i use
>it, i guess i'll stop using that one for now until i figure out a
>solution to what's going on.  Any ideas?????
>
>-Steve H.
>
